name: Crazy Chaotic Chicken Chase
description:
Play as a chicken being chased by a rhino. Destroy anything or anyone that gets in your way. It has an adventure mode with five levels and bosses and a survival mode with endless enemies and bosses.

System Requirements
  • Android 2.3 and up
  • Windows XP and up
  • Web Browser
More Details
  • The version for Android uses the Bluetooth permission for gamepads.
Last Update

Version 3.0
